format: These data frames contains the following columns:
reference:
Ripley, B.D. (1994)
Neural networks and related methods for
classification (with discussion).
Journal of the Royal Statistical Society series B

description:
Description
The synth.tr data frame has 250 rows and 3 columns.
The synth.te data frame has 100 rows and 3 columns.
It is intended that synth.tr be used from training and
synth.te for testing.
title: Synthetic Classification Problem
